text:
[Verse]
Feet are tapping in the park
Shadows moving in the dark
Feeling free under the sky
This dance will never say goodbye

[Verse 2]
Lights are sparkling in your eyes
No one cares about goodbyes
Move in rhythm side by side
In this moment we collide

[Chorus]
Hey hey we’re dancing in the moonlight
Hey hey no worries just delight
Hey hey together through the night
Hey hey this world's our stage tonight

[Verse 3]
Hearts are beating in the breeze
Spinning around with such ease
Closer now we hear the call
Together we won't ever fall

[Chorus]
Hey hey we’re dancing in the moonlight
Hey hey no worries just delight
Hey hey together through the night
Hey hey this world's our stage tonight

[Bridge]
Stars above they shine so bright
We don't need another light
Everyone can feel this groove
Underneath the sky we move
title: Dancing in the Moonlight
